name: Haze Maze
description:
HAZE MAZE

Game made for a jam. By: Leetle Toady (me)

CONTROLS

Mouse - move camera

WASD - move player

E - interact (press levers when close enough)

R - restart game

INSTRUCTIONS

Navigate around the world. Flip levers to change the maze. Reach the yellow portal to win! (It will appear once you have pressed all the levers). The game is pretty short, made in 10 hours.
